casebody.data:
Donald B. Gates v. City of Hartford et al. (13530)

Dupont, C. J., and O’Connell and Lavery, Js.

Submitted on briefs December 9, 1994 decision released January 3, 1995 Lawrence S. Dressier, Howard A. Lawrence and W. Paul Flynn filed a brief for the appellant (plaintiff). Michael E. Satti and Ann M. Siczewicz filed a brief for the appellees (defendants). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
